dt-api.name: button().node()
dt-api.summary: Get the button node for the selected button

type.returns: A jQuery object that contains the node of the selected button
type.description: Get a jQuery object that contains a reference to the node for the selected button.

dt-api.description: It can often be useful to have access to the DOM node of a button so you can manipulate it using directly jQuery or DOM methods. This method provides exactly that option.
